Room.Name: Skies West of Kista
Room.ShortDescription: Away to the east you can see the Towers of beautiful Kista. 60.n0.e16.s1.w0
Room.LongDescription: Down below, you can see where the grasslands of the Gotland Glen pushes up against the forest of Kista. The grassland makes a gentle but consant rise to the south, where more and more trees appear, and become the famous Kista Forest. The towers of the city glint like jewels in the distance, giving it a fairytale quality.
